categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hoddas Umgil was one of Nichos Marr's childhood friends and a youth of the Old Jedi Order who survived Order 66 issued by Supreme Chancellor Palpatine. Nichos remembered how they searched for Plett's Well. Umgil was one of the Children of the Jedi, hidden on Belsavis.
